content: this twisted ear warmer is quick easy and giftable it s also cute and comfy to wear gauge 7 sts x 5 row = 2 in half_double_crochet finished size 22 in length before joining for twist 4 in width time to complete 40 minutes the finished product is intended to fit the average adult but the size is easily adjusted by adding or subtracting foundation chain and half_double_crochet row use this pattern in any way you like please just credit me for the design i want this pattern to be as clear and concise as possible so i welcome all suggestions for improvement thank you and happy crafting
